<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Spinning Staff](/Spells.aspx?ID=1043)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Requirements** You're wielding a [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12).
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes and transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755). Make a melee Strike with your staff against one foe and then a second melee Strike with your staff against a different foe. Your multiple attack penalty applies to both of these attacks as normal.
name: Spinning Staff
